page.title: 12Strathmiglo's Clubs
page.content: In Strathmiglo there are various Clubs and Organisations young and old can join.For the young there are Brownies,Girl Guides,the Boys Brigade,Gymnastics,Judo and there is a Youth Club which was restarted earlier this year. For older people there is the Bowling Club, the Football Club, the Friendship Club, the Woman's Guild, the Woman's Rural Institute and there is also Yoga.One of the oldest clubs is the Bowling Club which was first established in 1901.To begin with, it was a private club for business men as ordinary people worked long hours in factories or on the land and did not have time for bowling.Now, nearly all the members are local. There are 210 members altogether 140 men and 70 women. About 150 are playing members, the others being social members.
